name: Viva la Vida - Robusto
additionalNotes:
In 2015, Cigar Inn owners Gus and Billy Fakih sold their two stores in New York with the ambition of starting their own brand of cigars, and Viva La Vida would be the first project to make it to the big times. The actual parent brand is called Artesano Del Tobaco, and Viva La Vida is made by none other
